title: Trove
notes: Updated under windows then replace it with the Linux steam Trove file. Lunch it then should still see Error about vista but then you can hit play.

title: Trove
notes: change minOS in Library/GlyphLibrary.xml to xp, then make the file read-only. See trove forums for details

title: Trove
notes: change minOS in Library/GlyphLibrary.xml to xp and make read only

title: Trove
notes:
You need to change minOS line in Library/GlyphLibrary.xml to xp, then make the file read-only.

The launcher freezes at the initial start. Just wait, it will download and install something.
Refuses to start with the error "This game requires at least Windows Vista to run" regardless of the Wine version set.
title: Trove

notes:
Works, in 60fps at 4k. But you need to change minOS line in Library/GlyphLibrary.xml to xp, then make the file read-only.The launcher freezes at the initial start. Just wait, it will download and install something.

And I also had to set it to fullscreen borderless, normal fullscreen did not work.
